p: Quantitative assessment of coagulations factor was performed in the plasma with DENV isolates using the ELISA Enzygnost (Dade Behring, Deerfield, IL, USA) according to the manufacturerâ€™s instructions. Examination, we used plasma from untreated patients. In the case of the negative control, plasma was utilized. In parallel restrained survey in presence of hirudin (special thrombin restrained) was completed.
